Text: Reminder Win K Your opinions on consumer productsPST Dear Harris Poll Online Member Our Consumer Products survey is still open If you havent yet participated you still have time to express your views Your thoughts on the subject are important and we would love for you to share them with us The survey will take approximately minutes to complete When you complete this survey we will offer you the chance to participate in our HIstakes drawing Well be giving away one prize HIstakes is open to US Canadian excluding Quebec and UK residents only You will receive up to HIpoints for completing this survey To participate in this survey please proceed to acnhtmid Please enter the password below when prompted at the beginning of the survey Password bfont colorAOL USERSb We encourage you to minimize the AOL window and use a nonAOL browser such as Netscape or Internet Explorer to participate in this survey These browsers will give you a better overall experience However if you would prefer to use the AOL browser please use the following link a hrefacnhtmid Consumer Productsafontfont color Password To view the Official Sweepstakes Rules please go to gHIstakesdhtm To learn more about our HarrisPollOnline Rewards program please go to hpolintrohtm You have received this invitation because you are a registered member of The Harris Poll Online To find out how you became a member of The Harris Poll Online please go to registernameshtm This email was intended for DON NRONCOM To be excluded from Harris Poll Online mailings go to unsubscribeaspXRKACNwhereInvite If you are unable to access the unsubscribe site please reply to this email and write Unsubscribe in the subject line For comments or questions contact Susan Richards or John Milton at the SurveyHelp Desk indexaspIDACN acnL

Got Answers Win Hello Wed like to invite you to our latest Harris Poll Online survey It covers a variety of topics and should only take about minutes to complete Come share your thoughts and experiences with us The survey will be open until am EST on Wednesday December th so wed love to hear from you soon When you complete this survey we will offer you the chance to participate in our HIstakes drawing Well be giving away one prize HIstakes is open to US Canadian excluding Quebec and UK residents only You will also get HIpoints for completing this survey To participate in this survey please proceed to qhtmid Please enter the password below when prompted at the beginning of the survey Password bfont colorAOL USERSb We encourage you to minimize the AOL window and use a nonAOL browser such as Netscape or Internet Explorer to participate in this survey These browsers will give you a better overall experience However if you would prefer to use the AOL browser please use the following link a hrefqhtmid Got Answersafontfont color Password We will send you selected results in a few weeks To view the Official HIstakes Rules please go to gHISTAKESchtm Learn more about our HarrisPollOnline Rewards program hpolintrohtm You have received this invitation because you are a registered member of The Harris Poll Online To find out how you became a member of The Harris Poll Online please go to registernameshtm This email was intended for DON NRONCOM To be excluded from Harris Poll Online mailings go to unsubscribeaspXRKQwhereInvite If you are unable to access the unsubscribe site please reply to this email and write Unsubscribe in the subject line For comments or questions contact Susan Richards or John Milton at the SurveyHelp Desk indexaspIDQ L

Win Home Purchases Survey Attention Shoppers This is your opportunity to participate in an exciting new Harris Poll Online survey about the kinds of purchases you have made for your home in the past few months We estimate it will take about to minutes to complete the study When you complete this survey we will offer you the chance to participate in our HIstakes drawing Well be giving away one prize of two prizes of and prizes of HIstakes is open to US Canadian excluding Quebec and UK residents only You will receive HIpoints for completing this survey To participate in this survey please proceed to Whtmid Please enter the password below when prompted at the beginning of the survey Password bfont colorAOL USERSb We encourage you to minimize the AOL window and use a nonAOL browser such as Netscape or Internet Explorer to participate in this survey These browsers will give you a better overall experience However if you would prefer to use the AOL browser please use the following link a hrefWhtmid Home Purchases Studyafontfont color Password To thank you for your participation we will also be sending you selected results in a few weeks To view the Official Sweepstakes Rules please go to gHIstakesahtm To learn more about our HarrisPollOnline Rewards program please go to hpolintrohtm Thank you for your participation You have received this invitation because you are a registered member of The Harris Poll Online To find out how you became a member of The Harris Poll Online please go to registernameshtm This email was intended for DON NRONCOM If you wish to be excluded from Harris Poll Online mailings please go to unsubscribeaspXRKWwhereInvite If you are unable to access the unsubscribe site please reply to this email and write Unsubscribe in the subject line If you have any comments or questions please contact Susan Richards or John Milton at the SurveyHelp Desk at indexaspIDW L
